short_reason: Large, integrated data/AI stack used for micro-targeted political messaging.
Practical control of key persuasion infrastructure concentrated in a small set of platforms.
Regular use of psychographic targeting and emotional priming within legal limits.
Counter-speech ecosystem exists but faces resource and reach disadvantages.
Partial safeguards on micro-targeting and AI use; coverage is narrow and enforcement uneven.
Cloud region expansion to new jurisdictions with limited independent audit access.
Platform launches opt-out tools for political targeting but discovery and defaults remain confusing for most users.
Report finds safety evaluations improving but still opaque for high-impact government-partner deployments.
